ui.main_menu.title: Dark Descent
key.mechanic.loot_score_bonus.tooltip.de:
The higher this value is, the [key.flavour.positive](higher quality) the loot you find in the [key.flavour.dungeon] will be.
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting. Its intended value is [key.flavour.important](0)
key.mechanic.loot_supply_bonus.tooltip.d:
The higher this value is, the [key.flavour.positive](more) loot you will find in the [key.flavour.dungeon].
This is an optional 'for-fun' setting. Its intended value is [key.flavour.important](0).
